item.title: How to Add Progress Bar in Basic Form Submission to Get Rid of Form Resubmission
item.author: polodev10@gmail.com (Shibu Deb Polo)
item.description: Few days ago, I created a form for submitting user information. It required to upload lot of images. which actually takes time. Since, it wasn’t a ajax form, I was unable to add any indication that “form is submitting” Adding Progress element using following method solve 2 problems: Help to rid of form Resubmission Giving indication to user about form submission So, after tinkering little time, I found a solution.
